subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The former pitcher Rick Ankiel homered twice and had three runs batted in yesterday, his latest power display, as the St. Louis Cardinals defeated the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers, 6-1.
snippet: The former pitcher Rick Ankiel homered twice and had three runs batted in yesterday, his latest power display, as the St. Louis Cardinals defeated the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers, 6-1.
